summary: A serial killer in Los Angeles celebrates Jack the Ripper's 100th birthday by committing similar murders and only one has a chance of stopping him.
cast: James Spader|Cynthia Gibb|Jim Haynie|Robert Picardo|Rod Loomis|Rex Ryon|Chris Mulkey|Wendell Wright|John Wesley|Bobby Hosea|Danitza Kingsley|Anne Betancourt|Diane Erickson|Sis Greenspon|Graham Timbes|Mario Machado|Paul Du Pratt|Rana Ford|Daniela Petr|Shawne Rowe|Kevin M. Glover|John Harrison|Cassian Elwes|Spencer Clarke|Pola Del Mar|Kathryn O'Reilly|Brian 'Fats' Bender|Richard Parker|Cindy Guyer|Frances Fleming
keywords: woman in jeopardy|murder of a prostitute|female removes her clothes|psychopathic killer|strip club owner
title: El regreso de Jack
